welcome.unknown_err_msg: Wi-Fi is turned off during router initialization, please check that your client device has reconnected to the router.
welcome.htmode_160_tips: 160MHz dynamic bandwidth has higher throughput and better signal coverage, after enabling this function, you need to wait for a while to scan the radar signal.
welcome.wifi_restart_loading_text: It may take a few seconds, please wait.
welcome.reconnected_wifi_loading_text: Make sure the device has reconnected to the following WiFi.
welcome.wifi_scan_code_tips: WiFi password can be modified individually in the Admin Panel.
welcome.not_collect_any_personal_data_tips: GL.iNet does not collect personal data. When cloud services are enabled, only essential router settings are collected to support remote management.
welcome.prevent_weak_pwd_tips: Enabling "Prevent Weak Password" will enable SSH functionality, while disabling it will turn off SSH functionality.
